meanings.definition: In a gluttonous manner; greedily consuming large quantities of food or drink.
meanings.sent1: He ate gluttonously at the buffet, piling his plate high with food.
meanings.sent2: She drank gluttonously from the pitcher, not leaving any for others.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon gluttonously raided the trash cans in search of leftovers.
meanings.sent4: The river gluttonously devoured the land during the flood.
meanings.sent5: The toddler gluttonously smeared cake all over his face during the birthday party.

meanings.definition: Excessively or extravagantly indulging in something.
meanings.sent1: The fashionista gluttonously bought every new trend she saw.
meanings.sent2: He gluttonously binge-watched the entire series in one night.
meanings.sent3: The cat gluttonously played with all the toys in the house at once.
meanings.sent4: The wildfire gluttonously consumed everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: The artist gluttonously painted on canvas after canvas, lost in creativity.
